issues.title: Problems provisioning with vagrant and berkshelf
issues.body:
Berksfile

``` ruby
site :opscode
metadata
cookbook 'mruby', git: 'https://github.com/higanworks-cookbooks/mruby.git'
```

Vagrantfile

``` ruby
config.vm.provision :chef_solo do |chef|
    chef.cookbooks_path = './chef/cookbooks'
    chef.roles_path     = './chef/roles'
    chef.data_bags_path = './chef/data_bags'
    chef.json           = {
        :java  => {
            :jdk_version    => 7,
            :install_flavor => 'openjdk',
            #:openjdk_packages =>  [ 'openjdk-7-jdk', 'openjdk-7-jre-headless' ]
        },

        :mruby => {
            :force_rebuild => true,

            :build_options => {
                :user_gems => [
                    [':git', 'https://github.com/iij/mruby-io.git']  ,
                    [':git', 'https://github.com/iij/mruby-socket.git'],
                    [':git', 'https://github.com/iij/mruby-pack.git'],
                    [':git', 'https://github.com/iij/mruby-ipaddr.git']

                ]
            }
        },
        :nginx => {
            :install_method  => 'source',
            :version         => '1.4.2',
            :configure_flags => ["--with-debug"],
            :source          => {
                :modules => [
                    'http_ssl_module',
                    'http_geoip_module',
                    'http_realip_module' ,
                    'http_stub_status_module',
                    'http_gzip_static_module'
                ]
            }
        }
    }

     chef.add_recipe 'mruby::default'
    chef.add_recipe 'mruby::ngx_mruby,nginx::default'
```

This yields the following error

``` bash
$vagrant provision
[Berkshelf] This version of the Berkshelf plugin has not been fully tested on this version of Vagrant.
[Berkshelf] You should check for a newer version of vagrant-berkshelf.
[Berkshelf] If you encounter any errors with this version, please report them at https://github.com/RiotGames/vagrant-berkshelf/issues
[Berkshelf] You can also join the discussion in #berkshelf on Freenode.
[Berkshelf] Updating Vagrant's berkshelf: '/Users/tim/.berkshelf/default/vagrant/berkshelf-20140130-12372-14t35w3-default'
[Berkshelf] Using nginx-mruby-test (0.1.0) at './chef'
[Berkshelf] Installing mruby (0.4.1) from git: 'https://github.com/higanworks-cookbooks/mruby.git' with branch: 'master' at ref: '501288ba603843c821853fdc2d51a1109f3edfff'
[Berkshelf] Using build-essential (1.4.2)

                               ^

output above. Please fix your recipes so that they properly complete.
```

commit.message: use master for ngx_mruby and mod_mruby
create recipe mod_mruby  but make fail
code cleanup, more friendly for nginx cookbook

support centos

and some features, see CHANGELOG
build when git repository was updated
